channel.title: Im getting my shot tomorrow (OPEN FOR DISCUSSION)
channel.description:
EDIT: TODAY! EDIT 2: WOOT I DID IT! SEE MY POST FOR DETAILS! EDIT 3: Hmmm.. I make interesting threads :)
I will keep this thread up to discuss these things (shots and blood tests). So if you have anything to say, just post it!
Anyways, this post below was from when I was notified about the shot: _______________________ The dreadful shot...
Is there anyway I can ease the pain without painkillers or medication or anything? and during the shot what should i think about or w/e should i do
omg im so scared rofl ahhhhh

item.title: Im getting my shot tomorrow (OPEN FOR DISCUSSION)
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

BloodRayne:

You guys are talking about getting black dots when you’re about to faint… That happens every time I sit up/stand up >> Getting out of bed, off the couch, out of chairs, off the toilet… >< Am I sickly? lawl

I get it from that too, ESPECIALLY after stretching when you stand up.

Big hits of weed will do it to me as well. But anyways, I’m going to lock this because he already got his needle and pretty much everything there was to say has already been said + this topic was just revived for no reason.

Read full topic
item.source: Im getting my shot tomorrow (OPEN FOR DISCUSSION)

item.title: Im getting my shot tomorrow (OPEN FOR DISCUSSION)
item.dc:creator: @bowserjr2 Bowser jr
item.description:
@bowserjr2 wrote:

[quote=“la­wl, post:45, topic:275102”]shots dont hurt at all, as long as your doctor does it right

i would be more worried about the side effects of it[/quote]
Have taked over 20, no side effects as I can remember.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @pk3r_john pk3r john
item.description:
@pk3r_john wrote:

[quote=“llib, post:41, topic:275102”]Shots are no big deal…just relax your muscles before you get the shot, I remember when I was 6 or so I bent the needle because I was so tensed up.

Fun stuff…

Belonephobia: fear of needles/injections[/quote]

Ouch

This thread is pretty old, from April

item.title: Im getting my shot tomorrow (OPEN FOR DISCUSSION)
item.dc:creator: @llib llib
item.description:
@llib wrote:

Shots are no big deal…just relax your muscles before you get the shot, I remember when I was 6 or so I bent the needle because I was so tensed up.

Fun stuff…

Belonephobia: fear of needles/injections

item.title: Im getting my shot tomorrow (OPEN FOR DISCUSSION)
item.dc:creator: @Tenac Tenac
item.description:
@Tenac wrote:

pk3r john, you’ve gotta be embarrassed about making this thread, in all honesty my 6 year old brother watches his arm as he gets shots, doesn’t flinch, and never complains, same goes for me. I know you already got the shot, but I had to say something lol.

Read full topic

@Mopman wrote:

The BCG was awesome, I was laughing my arse off at all the people crying and stuff

im the most friendly person ever irl honest

and i have lots of friends

item.title: Im getting my shot tomorrow (OPEN FOR DISCUSSION)
item.dc:creator: @pk3r_john pk3r john
item.description:
@pk3r_john wrote:

[quote=“PeterMan, post:35, topic:275102”][quote author=Archer link=topic=363435.msg2766856#msg2766856 date=1240865699]
IMO, shots always hurt a day or two after you get it.
[/quote]
http://www.immunisation.nhs.uk/Vaccines/BCG/FAQs/Why_is_the_BCG_vaccine_not_used_in_the_USA

The BCG kinda hurt a few days after I took it. And people were constantly punching it etc. I scratched the scrub off and green-yellowish goo came out of there :O[/quote]

Lol, wow

Read full topic

item.description:
@pk3r_john wrote:

item.title: Im getting my shot tomorrow (OPEN FOR DISCUSSION)
item.dc:creator: @goatee goatee
item.description:
@goatee wrote:

When I was in hospital they fed a tube up my vein (starting from around my elbow) all the way to my neck. When they put stuff up the tube it was so dirty I could feel it squirting into my neck. I didn’t care at the time cos they had so heavily drugged me but the memory is so disturbing.

Read full topic
item.source: Im getting my shot tomorrow (OPEN FOR DISCUSSION)

item.title: Im getting my shot tomorrow (OPEN FOR DISCUSSION)
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

Heh, don’t feel too bad mitb, i managed to pass out last time i had blood taken Was pretty embarassing, finished up and everything, got to the entrance of the docs surgery then just wiped out, was awesome

I don’t mind shots or needles though, I just hate having blood taken (yeah i know they take fuck all for a blood test, the idea just trips me out for some reason)

Read full topic

item.title: Im getting my shot tomorrow (OPEN FOR DISCUSSION)
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

Only needle I ever hated (well, 8 needles…) were stomach needles.

And it wasn’t the needle that hurt, it’s what they were injecting into me. It burned like you wouldn’t believe.

Read full topic
